name: Rune Møller Jensen
content: Rune Møller Jensen - IT-University of Copenhagen Rune Møller Jensen Associate Professor, Data ScienceHead of Center, The Maritime Hub Emailrmjitudk 1997 …2026 Research activity per year Personal profile Research areasFor more than 20 years, I have focused on container vessel stowage planning optimization with derived applications in capacity, network, and revenue management. With a background in symbolic-AI from CMU, I have moved into operations research and analytics. I apply optimization methods such as metaheuristics, constraint programming, and mathematical programming. In addition, I have carried out a wide range of industrial projects including churn prediction, terminal load planning, AIS ship ETA prediction, lashing force regression, and cargo forecasting. I spent half of my time as CEO of Sealytix which is a leading provider of  stowage analytics tools. As head of The Maritime Hub, my mission is to support young researchers at ITU. Link to short CV Some citations to get you through the day.
